patthana19.16:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.4: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.5: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.6: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:4.7: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.16:5.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.16:5.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.16:6.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.16:7.1: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe dasa … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
